title: Equinox eSport is Looking for a Coach
body:
We are interested in a committed and truly passionate personal to be a coach for our revitalised roster.

**Roles Include**:
Showing up to scrims
Doing pick and Ban
And standard feedback  (Marco play mainly)

**Benefits Include**:
Being part of a larger community
Helpful and fun people to work with
The environment to grow
Pay on promotion

If interested send me an add or message us on social media.
https://twitter.com/EquinoxOCE?lang=en
https://www.facebook.com/EquinoxEsportsOCE/

replies.body: hey btw im looking for a team to coach ill add u for a further talk
